pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.7.0, More Spells! $(li)Adds Flare $(li)Adds Cold Snap$(li)Adds Gravity$(li)Adds Craft$(li)Adds Conjure Water$(li)Harm now applies poison with Extend Time $(li)Heal now applies Regen with Extend Time$(li)Light now applies Glowing to other entities.$(li)Shiny new assets, by Ridanisaurus Rid!
